extendedInfo.description: Experience the game they're calling "Point, Click & Die" - Now even more terrifying!Night Whisper Lane is the 1st authentic Survival Horror gaming experience specifically designed for Mobile Devices that merges classic âPoint and Clickâ gameplay with a âTurn-Based Battle Systemâ to help you fend off whatever evil awaits you in this seemingly endless labyrinth. WARNING/DANGER: There are many hidden traps and deadly encounters on your journey that can and will kill your character! Be mindful of what you interact with as you look for items to solve puzzles and unlock doors & passages. Game Features: - Original Survival Horror Gaming Experience specifically made for Mobile Devices- Multiple Game Endings -âPoint and Clickâ gameplay featuring an engaging âTurn-Based Battle Systemâ - Authentic Survival Horror Story, even down to the camp- Startling 3D rendered rooms and areas with a hint of surreal- Gruesome booby-traps are hidden, some more deadly than others - Challenging Enemy/Boss Battles- Variety of items, weapons, health packs and other secrets to uncover - Eerie soundtrack- Auto Game save feature works in the background  - Animated Boss Battles- Help / How To Play section in Main Menu - Restore Save File from death from Booby-Trap - In Game MapsWeapons & ammunition are scarce so keep an eye out for them and manage them wisely because fighting empty handed is certain death. You will need to trust your instincts, wit and memory to uncover the mystery behind the house and its connection to a mystifying femme fatal. Will you survive long enough to escape from the terror on Night Whisper Lane? Make sure to restore your character's health by using Bandages and First-Aid kits especially if you have a sneaky suspicion a trap or encounter is lurking around. This concludes the Survival Guide. Become a fan! Come join us on Facebook and Twitter! Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/EpxGamesTwitter - http://twitter.com/EPXGamesYoutube Channel - http://www.youtube.com/user/EPXGamesHomepage - http://www.epxgames.comPlease rate!If you like the game, a rating goes along way in helping the game get more exposure If you have any issues please drop us an email -support@epxgames.com Buy the full version!If you enjoyed this FREE Trial version of Night Whisper Lane please consider purchasing the full version

reviews.title: Theae reviewers must be high....
reviews.comment: Boss fight mechanic is repetative and broken, there is no sweat if you have more health than the girl. Voice acting is atrocious and laughable. Any horror elements are soaked up by just how garbage the voice acting is. Every piece of the puzzle is foreseeable. Just awful. And money has absolutely no purpose..
reviews.author: Steven Kunka

reviews.comment: Could look a lot better, quickly boring
reviews.author: Michael Berns

reviews.title: Laughably bad
reviews.comment: Wretched storytelling and artwork, awkward gameplay. I would guess that this game was created by 15 year olds.

reviews.title: Great game for people that loves suspense.
reviews.comment: This game is made for the ones that loves suspense and the fear that faces you when you don\'t know what can happen in the next seconds. If you are that kind of person, you need to play this game!

reviews.title: Great point and click adventure
reviews.comment: I love a good point and click adventure, and this one even has weapons to fight with.  The creepy vibe is also great and the sound and graphics make it very moody.  Fun times!
reviews.author: Kevin Bradford

reviews.title: Awesome game. Download now!!!!!
reviews.comment: This games is worth paying full price let alone playing it for free. This game combines two game genres that works very well.  If you like horror as well as turn based RPG action.  This is the game to play.
reviews.author: Nitin Kamra

reviews.title: Complete crap
reviews.comment: Who made this piece of crap game? Horrible! Wasted time downloading this
